channel.title: CVE Feed for Alex Raven -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Alex Raven -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-34168|2023-12-18T22:36:12.774Z -- alex%20raven -- wp%20report%20post
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Alex Raven WP Report Post allows SQL Injection.This issue affects WP Report Post: from n/a through 2.1.2.

item.title: CVE-2023-34171|2023-11-09T19:22:26.206Z -- alex%20raven -- wp%20report%20post
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Alex Raven WP Report Post plugin <= 2.1.2 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-45769|2023-10-24T12:08:05.859Z -- alex%20raven -- wp%20report%20post
item.description: Unauth. Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Alex Raven WP Report Post plugin <= 2.1.2 versions.
